title: Magic in the Air
description: Meet the Winx Club, a group of beautiful fairies who fight evil using their unique magical powers! As they battle scary monsters and troublemaking witches, the girls become stronger fairies and closer friends.Magic in the Air When a computer bug hits Magix hard, the Winx Club goes digital, teaming up with their magic pets and Bloom’s diary to fight it! Later, the Winx take a field trip to an amazing perfumery, but there’s big trouble in the air. It’s up to Believix magic to save the day! Reads L to R (Western Style) for all ages.
author: Iginio Straffi
